name: #1 - How it's work ?
content: First, you can specify the number of the participant. After selecting your participant, you can write the name of the participant. Finally launch the tournament

name: #2 - How many people we can add ?
content: Actually the system work for 8 people max and 2 people minimum

name: #3 - Random Name
content: You can click on the random name button to generate randomly a name for each participant

name: #4 - Find tournament
content: To find a tournament, click on the search input and write the ID of the tournament
